input.sentences: my brother and i went to an activities workshop in town .
i had fun learning how to play a piano .
the other people in attendance were all very nice .
i even went to a meeting in which we discussed future activities .
at the end of the day | those in attendance took a group photo and we all had a good time .
output.sentences: This weekend I went to the town volunteer workshop with my brother.
We learned many skills, like how to play the electric piano.
There were many nice people there.
We held meetings to discuss the future of the organization.
At the end of the day, all of the attendants took a picture to remember the occasion.
